Articles.Content:
I recently had to take a short break, 5 months from the game due to life events. Now I'm back and I'm lost! I don't know where to start, don't know what to comment on, its like its an alien world. (no pun intended)

I love the game still but I can't make it feel like its home so to speak. Anyone else ever have this problem?

I had this the first time I 'burnt out' on KSP... I think I just started a new career game and went from there!

Hmmm, 5 months... does that mean you have only just started on 23.5?

I recently had to take a short break, 5 months from the game due to life events. Now I'm back and I'm lost! I don't know where to start, don't know what to comment on, its like its an alien world. (no pun intended)

TBH, you didn't missed anything that great in practice...or not. You'll only know when it's released.

I had this the first time I 'burnt out' on KSP... I think I just started a new career game and went from there!

Hmmm, 5 months... does that mean you have only just started on 23.5?

Yeah, I have screwed around with ARM though. Captured a few asteroids, landed a few, etc.
Give a mod you've not used before a spin. Near Future Technologies is a fun one.
